title: Julia Stiles
alt: I found an old tape of this episode in my family's closet. Check the news section of the forums to see the clip!
transcript:
The best thing ever to appear on TV:
12-year-old Julia Stiles as a hacker in a 1993 episode of PBS's "Ghostwriter"[A sketch of Julia Stiles, as a 12-year-old, with a bandana over her head, long wavy hair, elbow shirt, wrist band, and pants.]
Julia Stiles: Do you know anything about hackers?
Julia Stiles: Can you jam with the console cowboys in cyberspace?
Julia Stiles: Never experienced the new wave? Next wave? Dream wave? OR cyberpunk?
